candidates.title: Upgrade curl-sys to fix static linking issues with older versions of macOS
Update mockito requirement from 0.22 to 0.23

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Updates the requirements on [mockito](https://github.com/lipanski/mockito) to permit the latest version.
Release notes

Sourced from mockito's releases.

0.23.0

  • [Breaking] Increased the minimum supported Rust toolchain to 1.35.0.
  • Introduced the Mock#expect_at_least and Mock#expect_at_most functions to be used together with Mock#assert.
  • Bumped the percent-encoding dependency.
  • Introduced cargo fmt formatting as part of CI.

Thanks to @kornelski @xneomac @thomasetter

Commits
  • 21f9fd5 Bump to 0.23.0
  • 379dc0d Merge pull request #101 from kornelski/dep
  • 8c7d3b2 Bump dependency
  • 8fc98f4 Add expect_at_most and expect_at_least to the main documentation
  • 2b2410f Merge pull request #98 from xneomac/feature/at_least_and_at_most
  • 6ece388 Merge pull request #100 from lipanski/fix_appveyor_builds
  • ec2edb2 Make clippy happy for 1.35.0
  • 48dda98 Some changes to the README
  • 263eec2 Fix Appveyor tests by disabling the color feature for Appveyor builds
  • 8827fbb Sort badges
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

candidates.title: Handle more than just UTF-8 text
candidates.body:
Update text decoding methods to use incremental decoding with replacement characters, with support for multiple encodings provided by [encoding_rs](https://github.com/hsivonen/encoding_rs).

Fixes #90.

candidates.title: Upgrade to http 0.2 and refactor configuration
candidates.body:
Upgrade to using the recently released http 0.2. Among other things, this moves to by-value builders which allows us to extract request configuration into a common trait as described in #48.

This is a breaking change, since the http crate is part of our public API.

Fixes #48.

candidates.title: use 'default-feature = false' on futures-util
candidates.body: once https://github.com/sagebind/sluice/pull/7 is merged isahc will no longer depend on the `syn` crate, which should improve compile times and drops the dependency count from 41 to 34

candidates.title: Update bytes requirement from 0.4 to 0.5

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Updates the requirements on [bytes](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes) to permit the latest version.
Changelog *Sourced from [bytes's changelog](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > # 0.5.0 (November 25, 2019) > > ### Fix > - potential overflow in `copy_to_slice` > > ### Changed > - Increased minimum supported Rust version to 1.39. > - `Bytes` is now a "trait object", allowing for custom allocation strategies ([#298](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/298)) > - `BytesMut` implicitly grows internal storage. `remaining_mut()` returns > `usize::MAX` ([#316](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/316)). > - `BufMut::bytes_mut` returns `&mut [MaybeUninit]` to reflect the unknown > initialization state ([#305](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/305)). > - `Buf` / `BufMut` implementations for `&[u8]` and `&mut [u8]` > respectively ([#261](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/261)). > - Move `Buf` / `BufMut` "extra" functions to an extension trait ([#306](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/306)). > - `BufMutExt::limit` ([#309](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/309)). > - `Bytes::slice` takes a `RangeBounds` argument ([#265](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/265)). > - `Bytes::from_static` is now a `const fn` ([#311](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/311)). > - A multitude of smaller performance optimizations. > > ### Added > - `no_std` support ([#281](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/281)). > - `get_*`, `put_*`, `get_*_le`, and `put_*le` accessors for handling byte order. > - `BorrowMut` implementation for `BytesMut` ([#185](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/185)). > > ### Removed > - `IntoBuf` ([#288](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/288)). > - `Buf` implementation for `&str` ([#301](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/301)). > - `byteorder` dependency ([#280](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/280)). > - `iovec` dependency, use `std::IoSlice` instead ([#263](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/263)). > - optional `either` dependency ([#315](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/315)). > - optional `i128` feature -- now available on stable. ([#276](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/276)). > > # 0.4.12 (March 6, 2019) > > ### Added > - Implement `FromIterator<&'a u8>` for `BytesMut`/`Bytes` ([#244](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/244)). > - Implement `Buf` for `VecDeque` ([#249](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/249)). > > # 0.4.11 (November 17, 2018) > > * Use raw pointers for potentially racy loads ([#233](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/233)). > * Implement `BufRead` for `buf::Reader` ([#232](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/232)). > * Documentation tweaks ([#234](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/234)). > > # 0.4.10 (September 4, 2018) > > * impl `Buf` and `BufMut` for `Either` ([#225](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/225)). > * Add `Bytes::slice_ref` ([#208](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/208)). > > ... (truncated)
Commits - [`b7c1f2a`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/b7c1f2a1357f7f9cdf2eb0187398fc80aaf7e28d) prepare v0.5.0 release ([#319](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/319)) - [`cdd9fc0`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/cdd9fc09cd78bed7e2e7e00bab85a632c7fa0f88) Export public the combinator types ([#318](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/318)) - [`44fb206`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/44fb2061481d254f94ad9902df1dcb1bda2cd8d8) add BufMutExt::limit ([#309](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/309)) - [`b3f86d8`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/b3f86d8654aac8fb5b3d5556771c79813be45c01) remove either feature ([#315](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/315)) - [`8135c1f`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/8135c1f60692eff20cbc3f3d297704aa7600dbb7) implicitly grow BytesMut; add BufMutExt::chain_mut ([#316](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/316)) - [`59aea9e`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/59aea9e8719d8acff18b586f859011d3c52cfcde) Make Bytes::from_static a const fn ([#311](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/311)) - [`9a10add`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/9a10addb444314f48ddae96958e7b0951b907012) Change loom tests to use cfg(loom) internally ([#314](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/314)) - [`b32f629`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/b32f6298e289958986b68982788562f3c097f8fc) Improve performance of `BytesMut::reserve` ([#313](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/313)) - [`856ed7c`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/856ed7c43de8eca457cc5e00b7fdcc3edeb4c52a) implement Buf for std::io::Cursor ([#308](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/308)) - [`96268a8`](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/commit/96268a80d44db04142ff168506e9bff8682d9a15) Move "extra" methods to extension traits ([#306](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/tokio-rs/bytes/issues/306)) - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0)

Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

chosen_pr.title: Upgrade to http 0.2 and refactor configuration
chosen_pr.body:
Upgrade to using the recently released http 0.2. Among other things, this moves to by-value builders which allows us to extract request configuration into a common trait as described in #48.

This is a breaking change, since the http crate is part of our public API.

Fixes #48.

chosen_detail.title: Upgrade to http 0.2 and refactor configuration
chosen_detail.body:
Upgrade to using the recently released http 0.2. Among other things, this moves to by-value builders which allows us to extract request configuration into a common trait as described in #48.

This is a breaking change, since the http crate is part of our public API.

Fixes #48.
